remarks: Self-referential expression for the ordered power series structure. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 8-Feb-2015.)
statement:
opsrval2.s $e |- S = ( I mPwSer R ) $.
opsrval2.o $e |- O = ( ( I ordPwSer R ) ` T ) $.
opsrval2.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` O ) $.
opsrval2.i $e |- ( ph -> I e. V ) $.
opsrval2.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. W ) $.
opsrval2.t $e |- ( ph -> T C_ ( I X. I ) ) $.
opsrval2 $p |- ( ph -> O = ( S sSet <. ( le ` ndx ) , .<_ >. ) ) $.
